actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil Service and General Services.
Subcommittee on Civil Service and General Services. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-552.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Approved for reporting without amendment favorably.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service, Post Office, and General Services

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make the Chairman of the Federal Labor Relations Authority the chief executive and administrative officer of the Federal Labor Relations Authority.

summary.text: Designates the Chairman of the Federal Labor Relations Authority as the chief executive and administrative officer of the Authority.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make the Chairman of the Federal Labor Relations Authority the chief executive and administrative officer of the Federal Labor Relations Authority.
